Hello,

NihontoAuction.com is up and running. We've have a few good auctions
and some really neat Japanese sword related items. I would like to
make a one time announcement on the following.

I've just created some sponsor links at NihontoAuctions.com. The
eventual idea is to provide the space for these links at a nominal fee
of around $2.00 per week. With a web interface that potential
advertisers can use to purchase advertising space. Since I don't have
that setup yet, I've had to manually create the links. You'll notice
that is looks a lot like Google AdWords :-) But unlike AdWords, it's
comparatively cheap.

What you see now are links created for people that are providing
NihontoAuctions.com with a link on their website. I'm sorry if I
forgot anyone, please contact me privately and I'll add you.

Once I get the ad purchasing webpage complete, I will create a LINKS
page and move these links to that page. For now, and until I get the
purchasing webpage complete, I'm offering free link/ad space for those
interested. It's a first come first served sort of thing since I have
limited space. Please contact me privately if you are interested.

Again, I will create a links page in which I will place free of charge
anyones link that links NihontoAuctions.com. HOWEVER, for those
interested in front page advertising space, the cost will be around $2
a week once I get the purchasing webpage complete. (Approx 1 month).

I hope this is fair. I'm not doing this to get rich, but to pay server
fees so I can continue to provide this service.

Thanks for the band-width,
Deron

http://www.nihontoauctions.com
